title: [QuickShop]空岛中其它岛的商店无法使用
author: 逗神·雷疯
txt_content: 最近想开个空岛服，但是在做系统商店时，发现不开op没办法打开其他岛屿的商店，求解

replies.author: Mark520
replies.txt_content:
/mangaddp builder quickshop.use
/mangaddp builder quickshop.create.sell 
/mangaddp builder quickshop.create.buy  
/mangaddp builder quickshop.find
/mangaddp builder quickshop.create.changeprice  都输入一遍就可以所有人用了

replies.author: Mark520
replies.txt_content: 是没办法打开其他岛的商店  还是其他岛用不了商店？

replies.author: 逗神·雷疯
replies.txt_content:
Mark520 发表于 2017-1-7 20:54
是没办法打开其他岛的商店  还是其他岛用不了商店？
没法打开其它岛的商店

replies.author: Mark520
replies.txt_content: 意思是在别的岛做了商店 OP右键开不了？

replies.author: 逗神·雷疯
replies.txt_content:
Mark520 发表于 2017-1-7 20:59
意思是在别的岛做了商店 OP右键开不了？
非op开不了

replies.author: Mark520
replies.txt_content: 其他玩家开不了商店是要给权限的问题

replies.author: 逗神·雷疯
replies.txt_content:
Mark520 发表于 2017-1-7 21:10
其他玩家开不了商店是要给权限的问题
空岛的权限吗

replies.author: 逗神·雷疯
replies.txt_content:
Mark520 发表于 2017-1-7 21:21
/mangaddp builder quickshop.use
/mangaddp builder quickshop.create.sell 
/mangaddp builder quickshop ...
还是用不了

replies.author: 逗神·雷疯
replies.txt_content:
Block_QwQ 发表于 2017-1-8 12:16
拜托，是左键啊
是左键的啊

replies.author: Block_QwQ
replies.txt_content:
逗神·雷疯 发表于 2017-1-8 12:44
是左键的啊
输入list
然后看有没有Builder
如果没有，就
/mangaddp default quickshop.use
/mangaddp default quickshop.create.sell 
/mangaddp default quickshop.create.buy  
/mangaddp default quickshop.find
/mangaddp default quickshop.create.changeprice
如果都有,那么
/mangaddp builder quickshop.use
/mangaddp builder quickshop.create.sell 
/mangaddp builder quickshop.create.buy  
/mangaddp builder quickshop.find
/mangaddp builder quickshop.create.changeprice
再或者再全部权限名上面加个"+“，比如+quickshop.use

replies.author: 逗神·雷疯
replies.txt_content:
Block_QwQ 发表于 2017-1-8 12:52

replies.txt_content:
